languages.text: "Это ты так намекаешь, что чуть что — и планету Лорд-капитана взорвут? Весьма тактично, господин дознаватель — спасибо, что хоть предупредил!"
"Is this your way of hinting that they're going to blow up the Lord Captain's planet? That was very considerate, Master Interrogator — thanks for the warning, at least!"
languages.original_text: "Это ты так намекаешь, что чуть что — и планету Лорд-капитана взорвут? Весьма тактично, господин дознаватель — спасибо, что хоть предупредил!"

traits.locale_text: "Is this your way of hinting that they're going to blow up the Lord Captain's planet? That was very considerate, Master Interrogator — thanks for the warning, at least!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你是在暗示，审判庭打算把舰长大人的行星炸成碎片吗？这可实在是太体贴了，审讯官大人。好吧，至少我得感谢一下你的提醒！”
languages.original_text: "Is this your way of hinting that they're going to blow up the Lord Captain's planet? That was very considerate, Master Interrogator — thanks for the warning, at least!"

traits.locale_text: “你是在暗示，审判庭打算把舰长大人的行星炸成碎片吗？这可实在是太体贴了，审讯官大人。好吧，至少我得感谢一下你的提醒！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Donc en clair, ils vont faire exploser la planète {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, c'est bien ça ? C'est très aimable de votre part de nous prévenir, maître interrogateur ! »
languages.original_text: "Is this your way of hinting that they're going to blow up the Lord Captain's planet? That was very considerate, Master Interrogator — thanks for the warning, at least!"

traits.locale_text: « Donc en clair, ils vont faire exploser la planète {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, c'est bien ça ? C'est très aimable de votre part de nous prévenir, maître interrogateur ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¿Significa eso que van a destruir el planeta de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? Qué amable por su parte, maestro Interrogador. ¡Por lo menos nos ha avisado!».
languages.original_text: "Is this your way of hinting that they're going to blow up the Lord Captain's planet? That was very considerate, Master Interrogator — thanks for the warning, at least!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Significa eso que van a destruir el planeta de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? Qué amable por su parte, maestro Interrogador. ¡Por lo menos nos ha avisado!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「それはロード・キャプテンの星を荒らすぞって言いたいの？ずいぶん思いやりにあふれてるのね、マスター・インテロゲイター…一応言っておくわ、ご警告ありがとう！」
languages.original_text: "Is this your way of hinting that they're going to blow up the Lord Captain's planet? That was very considerate, Master Interrogator — thanks for the warning, at least!"

traits.locale_text: 「それはロード・キャプテンの星を荒らすぞって言いたいの？ずいぶん思いやりにあふれてるのね、マスター・インテロゲイター…一応言っておくわ、ご警告ありがとう！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr damit etwa andeuten, dass sie den Planeten des Lord Captains in die Luft sprengen werden? Das war sehr freundlich, Meister Interrogator, danke für die Warnung!"
languages.original_text: "Is this your way of hinting that they're going to blow up the Lord Captain's planet? That was very considerate, Master Interrogator — thanks for the warning, at least!"

languages.original_text: "Is this your way of hinting that they're going to blow up the Lord Captain's planet? That was very considerate, Master Interrogator — thanks for the warning, at least!"

languages.text: "Böyle diyerek Lord Kaptan'ın gezegenini havaya uçuracaklarını mı ima ediyorsun? Ne ince düşüncelisin be Üstat Sorgucu. En azından uyarı için teşekkür ederiz!"
languages.original_text: "Is this your way of hinting that they're going to blow up the Lord Captain's planet? That was very considerate, Master Interrogator — thanks for the warning, at least!"
